If by slight chance at the time of purchase it is not available to sell or ship, you will be notified by the next business day and payment will be refunded in full.Drive - Wildfire X2This Drive WildFire X2 has a double-cutaway body with an arched carved top. The maple neck with rosewood fingerboard is set into the body with a comfy tapered neck joint and has an angled, luthier's joint headstock with a direct string-pull design. The 24-3/4" scale rosewood fretboard has 22 frets and pearl trapezoid inlays. Comes equipped with dual humbuckers, a 3-way pickup selector, volume, and tone knobs. All of which are clean. Chrome hardware includes an adjustable fixed bridge, a stop tailpiece, and precision die-cast tuning machines. As you can see by the pictures, the body & neck are in great shape, with minimal fretwear. And the pink finish is quite eye catching!
